2021-11-05.name: Eiga Sumikko Gurashi: Aoi Tsukiyo no Mahou no Ko
2021-11-05.desc: * Based on a set of fictional characters produced by San-X.

2021-11-12.name: Eiga Youkai Watch: Keita to Orecchi no Deai Hen da Nyan Wa,  Watakushi mo
2021-11-12.desc: A compilation film with new added scenes.

2021-11-12.name: Koukaku Kidoutai: SAC_2045: Jizoku Kanou Sensou
2021-11-12.desc:
* Based on Shirou Masamune's original 1989 cyberpunk action manga Ghost in the Shell.

A compilation film with newly added footage.

2021-11-12.name: Summer Ghost
2021-11-12.desc:
Tomoya, Aoi, and Ryou are high school students who met through the Internet. The urban legend of the Summer Ghost is that it is a ghost of a young woman who appears when fireworks are lit. Tomoya is unable to step out into the life he wants. Aoi is unable to find her place in the world. Ryou's bright future is suddenly closed to him. Each of them has their own reasons for meeting the Summer Ghost. On a summer night when life and death intersect, where will each of their thoughts go to?

Source: Crunchyroll

2021-11-13.name: Blade Runner: Black Lotus
2021-11-13.desc:
Los Angeles 2032. A young woman wakes up with no memories, and possessing deadly skills. The only clues to her mystery are a locked data device and a tattoo of a black lotus. Putting together the pieces, she must hunt down the people responsible for her brutal and bloody past to find the truth of her lost identity.

Source: crunchyroll

2021-11-14.name: Fanren Xiu Xian Chuan: Mo Dao Zhengfeng

2021-11-17.name: Sore, Sunawachi Sketch.
2021-11-17.desc:
The web anime depicts two girls, Hajime and Chizuru, who are stranded on a remote island, and how they encourage each other to live a survival life while doing their favorite comedy sketches.

Source: Crunchyroll News

2021-11-25.name: Super Crooks
2021-11-25.desc:
* Based on a comic by Mark Millar and artist Leinil Francis Yu.

One last heist. That's what they all say, right? Just one final score, and everyone can retire and take up fishing. Thing is, the jails are filled with super villains who thought the same thing, and got busted. But the Heat's in a jam. He's run up the kind of gambling debt that - if he can't pay it back in cash - will be paid in blood. Nobody wants to see the most beloved supercrook of all time rubbed out by the mob - especially his biggest fan, Johnny Bolt. And Johnny's got a plan to help the Heat and make all his buddies disgustingly rich at the same time. Unfortunately for Johnny's recruits, they have to head to Spain and rob the world's most notorious super villain blind. And that's where things get tricky.

Source: Icon Comics

2021-11-30.name: Massara
2021-11-30.desc: An original animated short film was inspired by the song "Massara" by Kiyoe Yoshioka, the vocalist of the band Ikimono Gakari.

2021-11-30.name: Shenyi Jiu Xiaojie
2021-11-30.desc:
The film is a big female drama in the genre of metaphysical adventure, with a passionate and hot adventure story that makes this film unique and charming. The heroine, Jun Jiu, relies on her exquisite medical skills to save lives and help the injured, and struggles to train in a world where strength is everything. She is brave, intelligent, resilient and cunning, and will not frown in the face of any enemy, no matter how fierce they are. As the saying goes, "the poor and the strong do not fall short of their ambition", and she uses her bravery and hard work to create one miracle after another on the path of enlightenment. She is a generous but not saintly woman who is not soft on evil people, and who is willing to put herself in harm's way when it comes to her friends. This is not just a story about the adventure of rebirth, unlike other chaotic and murderous fantasy stories, it is a fantasy world full of flesh and blood and goodwill.

source: baike.baidu.com/DeepL.com
